title: Secrets
itunes:title: Secrets
description: Back from the IPCPR Trade Show, get the inside scoop on the last and hottest premium cigars hitting the shelves. Plus, Dave Garofalo gives his choice for best new brand, best new products, best new accessory, rookie of the year, and much, much more. We light up the Recluse by Iconic Leaf Cigar Company,  and maybe the BEST cigars Dave's ever smoked, "Byron," "Atabey," and "Bandolero." And the Cigar Genius makes his debut... http://www.facebook.com/cigargenius
